_sText:
Cs_smallcity (Old map called "bigbads_city")

Included...
-HDR 
and more!
______________________________________________

¤¤¤¤¤¤
Install:  <======
¤¤¤¤¤¤
_______________________________________________

(If you have a older version of this map and when you join someone with this map and it says "your map is diffreint" If that happends install this version and remove the old)
_______________________________________________

¤¤¤¤¤¤
Install: <======
¤¤¤¤¤¤
_____________________

For vista/win7 users:
Go to 
Computer/hardrive(C:)/Program files (x86)/steam/steamapps/youraccname/Counter-Strike Source/cstrike/---> (Put in the folder called "maps" here)
                                                              
(if you not have steam as that folder it can be valve and if that it will be valve/steam/steamapps(and same as the other install) )
________________________
For xp(or older) users:
Go to
Computer/hardrive-(C:)/Programfiles/steam/steamapps/youraccname/Counter-Strike Source/cstrike/---> (Put in the folder called "maps" here)


(if you not have steam as that folder it can be valve and if that it will be valve/steam/steamapps(and same as the other install) )
______________________________________________

Credits: 
-All credits go to bigbad that created the map himself.
tsaweeos - For helping with tips.
/ Bigbad :D
______________________________________________
